REVIEWS

Samar is a real estate professional in a league of her own. From the moment I first reached out, Samar went above and beyond to listen to what my husband and I wanted, promptly communicate, and find us our new home. Her knowledge of the market is unparalleled (seriously, she knows every building in Miami, and I am sure beyond), and she found us our perfect fit within 3 viewings. Finding a new home is stressful and can cause emotions to run high but Samar was a commensurate professional every step of the way; she put our every worry at ease (and did so with grace!). I cannot recommend her highly enough.

By far and away this is the best real estate agent I have ever worked with and I have bought and sold many homes in Florida, in fact I am a real estate closing attorney specializing in high net worth client real estate transactions. She goes over and beyond what is expected of a realtor, and she was an incredible support for me and my daughter while my home was for sale in Florida and I was out of state. She is an incredible negotiator, always calm, always polite even in the most stressful of circumstances. She is extremely knowledgeable and was always up to speed with listings in my area. Her Open Houses were prepared in advance with great care, thought and her own investment. They were gorgeous! I would recommend her to anyone I consider a great friend.

Lisa has been nothing short of outstanding. She's extremely responsive and knows her local market very well. She was able to help us secure an off market condo, significantly below the asking price of similar condos in the same building by leveraging her networking skills and being very plugged in with owners and associations in all the best buildings. I highly recommend her.

Gabriel has made the experience of finding a place extremely fun in a time that should be very stressful! He works tirelessly to make sure that you find the perfect place for you at the budget you have! Gabriel made the process of moving from NJ to Miami easy and also provided incredible insight on the area, building, and negotiation process. At no point of the process did I feel overwhelmed or worried because I knew Gabriel was a top level Realtor!! I would whole heartedly recommended Gabriel to anyone looking for a place in Miami!

Emily is an absolute rockstar. I had the pleasure of working along side her on a recent transaction. She was communicative and followed through on everything promised throughout the process. She was always available and extremely easy to work with. I would highly recommend her to anyone looking for a rockstar agent.
